an1.394:1.1: “Accharasanghatamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pathamam jhanam bhaveti, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave:
an1.394:1.2: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhano viharati, satthusasanakaro ovadapatikaro, amogham ratthapindam bhunjati’.
an1.394:1.3: Ko pana vado ye nam bahulikaronti”ti.
an1.395:1.1: “Accharasanghatamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dutiyam jhanam bhaveti …pe…
an1.402:1.1: Kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam …pe…
an1.405:1.1: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
an1.406:1.1: Anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
an1.407:1.1: uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
an1.408:1.1: Anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati;
an1.409:1.1: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
an1.439:1.1: Ajjhattam rupasanni bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani.
an1.440:1.1: … ajjhattam rupasanni bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani.
an1.441:1.1: … ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani.
an1.442:1.1: … ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani.
an1.443:1.1: … ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani.
an1.444:1.1: … ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani.
an1.445:1.1: … ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani.
an1.446:1.1: … ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani.
an1.450:1.1: sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ananto akasoti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an1.451:1.1: sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an1.452:1.1: sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma natthi kinciti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an1.453:1.1: sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an1.454:1.1: sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati ….
an1.574:2.2: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhano viharati satthusasanakaro ovadapatikaro, amogham ratthapindam bhunjati’.
an1.574:2.3: Ko pana vado ye nam bahulikaronti”ti.
